//Generated by BehavEd

set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "ON" );
set ( "SET_NOCLIP", "ON" );
set ( "SET_NAVIGATION", "OFF" );
set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "OFF" );
set ( "SET_ANIM_LOOP", "ON" );
set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Script|Full+None+Normal+Stand|Coughing and choking - standing up" );

task ( "choke" )
{
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/pain_death/male/choke.mp3" );
}


loop ( -1 )
{
	dowait ( "choke" );
	wait ( $random( 5000, 10000 )$ );
}
